item.title: Wont type?=/
item.dc:creator: @Westside_Rep Westside Rep
item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

This is a lot easier… just replace it with this

[scar]SendKeys (‘27’)[/scar]

and thats all you have to do…no includes or anything…works perfect for me…

item.title: Wont type?=/
item.dc:creator: @fooktard fooktard
item.description:
@fooktard wrote:

this code is for my autofletcher, it clicks the bmp’s and when its time to enter “27” on make X it just does’nt type it, and i dont get it coz the code compiles perfect :eek:

heres the code.

[scar]procedure selectinglogbow;
begin
movemousesmooth(254,401);
wait(1000+random(100));
Clickmouse(254,401,false);
wait(500+random(100));
findbitmap(makex,x,y);
movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(1000+random(100));
findbitmap(makexyellow,x,y);
wait(500+random(100));
Clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(500+random(100));
SendText(‘27’);
end;[/scar]

As you can see the “SendText(‘27’);” is there but it just doesnt type, can any1 help? :(

Read full topic
